title: The Street - relationship to urban setting

content.question: In a well-written essay, analyze how Petry uses literary elements and techniques to develop Lutie Johnson’s complex relationship to the urban setting.

frqParts.text: In a well-written essay, analyze how Petry uses literary elements and techniques to develop Lutie Johnson’s complex relationship to the urban setting.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Describe the relationship between a character and a setting.
